statements: UPDATE driver_performance_metrics SET driving_speed = 70, fuel_efficiency = 12.5 WHERE driver_id = 1;
UPDATE driver_performance_metrics SET fuel_efficiency = 11.8, driving_speed = 65 WHERE driver_id = 2;
UPDATE driver_performance_metrics SET driving_speed = 70, fuel_efficiency = 25.5 WHERE driver_id = 123;
UPDATE driver_performance_metrics SET fuel_efficiency = 30.75, driving_speed = 65 WHERE driver_id = 456;
UPDATE speed_metrics SET speed = 60.5 WHERE driver_id = 1001;
UPDATE fuel_metrics SET fuel_efficiency = 9.8 WHERE driver_id = 2003;
UPDATE speed_metrics SET speed = 100.5 WHERE driver_id = 123 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01 10:00:00';
UPDATE fuel_metrics SET fuel_efficiency = 8.5, timestamp = '2022-02-15 08:30:00' WHERE driver_id = 456;
UPDATE Drivers SET driving_speed = 70 WHERE driver_id = 123;
UPDATE Trips SET start_location = 'City A', distance_traveled = 150 WHERE trip_id = 456;
UPDATE Drivers SET driving_speed = 80, fuel_efficiency = 9.5 WHERE driver_id = 101;
UPDATE Trips SET distance_traveled = 150.25, start_location = 'City A', trip_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE trip_id = 201;
UPDATE drivers SET driving_speed = 70 WHERE driver_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE trips SET distance_traveled = 200 WHERE trip_id = 1;
UPDATE drivers SET fuel_efficiency = 35 WHERE driver_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE trips SET distance_traveled = 150 WHERE trip_id = 101;
UPDATE drivers SET age = 30 WHERE driver_id = 'b2a6ba8b-7c66-4d80-a92b-029f7c7f2b92';
UPDATE vehicle SET year = 2019, model = 'Toyota Camry' WHERE vehicle_id = '0f8f16ab-d8b0-41f4-82c3-573977cbd90e';
UPDATE drivers SET age = age + 1 WHERE driver_id = '0a7bc0ff-ce3d-41df-8214-22ce3a0c2f52';
UPDATE vehicle SET year = 2019, model = 'SUV' WHERE driver_id = '015c8de2-d82c-4ba6-9615-0c1d669c88ae';
